authors.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quotes: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.

authors.name: Anonymous
quotes: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
We might be wrong, but we are not confused
If you do not know what we want to achieve, how can you learn from it
Becoming is better than being
Scarcity is the Mother of Innovation
Team work, makes dream work
Alone you may go fast, but together we go further

authors.name: John D. Rockefeller
quotes: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
The secret of success is to do the common things uncommonly well.

authors.name: Aristotle Onassis
quotes: The secret to success is to know something nobody else knows.

authors.name: Frank Sinatra
quotes: The best revenge is massive success.

authors.name: Arnold H. Glasow
quotes: Success is not the result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.

authors.name: Vidal Sassoon
quotes: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.

authors.name: Winston Churchill
quotes: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Give us the tools and we will finish the job.
Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

authors.name: Ann Landers
quotes: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don't recognize them.

authors.name: Walt Disney
quotes: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

authors.name: Napoleon Hill
quotes: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.

authors.name: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
quotes: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.

authors.name: Kevin Durant
quotes: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.

authors.name: Henry David Thoreau
quotes: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

authors.name: Ralph Nader
quotes: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.

authors.name: Booker T. Washington
quotes: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.

authors.name: Jim Rohn
quotes: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.

authors.name: Albert Einstein
quotes: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
We cannot solve problems with the kind of thinking we employed when we came up with them.
The more I learn, the more I realize how much I don't know.
The mind that opens to a new idea never returns to its original size.
The most beautiful experience we can have is the mysterious. It is the fundamental emotion that stands at the cradle of true art and true science.
It is not that I'm so smart. But I stay with the questions much longer.
The most incomprehensible thing about the universe is that it is comprehensible.
Science is a wonderful thing if one does not have to earn one's living at it.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
The important thing is to never stop questioning.
Science is the search for truth, not the search for validation.
The pursuit of truth is more precious than its possession.
Persistence is the most powerful force on earth, it can move mountains.

authors.name: Peter Drucker
quotes: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

authors.name: Bill Gates
quotes: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.

authors.name: Steve Jobs
quotes: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Focus is about saying no.

authors.name: Albert Schweitzer
quotes: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.

authors.name: Samuel Goldwyn
quotes: The harder I work, the luckier I get.

authors.name: Confucius
quotes: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.

authors.name: Wayne Gretzky
quotes: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.

authors.name: Robert Collier
quotes: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.

authors.name: Colin Powell
quotes: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.

authors.name: Bo Bennett
quotes: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.

authors.name: Bruce Lee
quotes: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.

authors.name: Vince Lombardi
quotes: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is.

authors.name: Will Rogers
quotes: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
You've got to go out on a limb sometimes because that's where the fruit is

authors.name: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
You must be the change you wish to see in the world.

authors.name: George S. Patton
quotes: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.

authors.name: Thomas Jefferson
quotes: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
If you want something you've never had, you must be willing to do something you've never done.

authors.name: Aisha Tyler
quotes: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.

authors.name: Colin R. Davis
quotes: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.

authors.name: Charles Kingsleigh
quotes: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.

authors.name: Chris Grosser
quotes: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.

authors.name: Henry Ford
quotes: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.

authors.name: William Butler Yeats
quotes: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.

authors.name: Gary Vaynerchuk
quotes: You have to understand your own personal DNA. Don't do things because I do them or Steve Jobs or Mark Cuban tried it. You need to know your personal brand and stay true to it
The reason I was able to grow my business is that I recognized that marketing is about storytelling
I'm not worried about being fancy. I'm worried about being impactful
The best marketing strategy ever: Care
Business is much like a sport; you need to hustle, strategize, and outwork your competition
Ideas are worthless without execution
No matter what you do, your job is to tell your story
Don't be scared to break things. Don't be scared to make mistakes
The market doesn't care about your feelings. It cares about value
The person who gives the value first wins
Skills are cheap. Passion is priceless
Stop hanging around people who don't want to win
Without hustle, talent will only carry you so far
Your legacy is being written by yourself. Make the right decisions
Too many people play defense. I play offense
The best thing you can do is invest in your own happiness
Patience is the secret weapon to success in business and life
Life is long. Play the long game

authors.name: Joe Rogan
quotes: Work for that feeling that you have accomplished something
The universe rewards calculated risk and passion
Greatness and madness are next-door neighbors, and they often borrow each other's sugar
Be the hero of your own story
One of the most fascinating lessons I've absorbed about life is that the struggle is good
The key to happiness doesn't lay in numbers in a bank account but in the way we make others feel
There's a direct correlation between positive energy and positive results
If you can control your mind, you can control your whole life
A happy life is one of contribution, not consumption
The road to success is paved with failure
Discipline equals freedom
Science is just exploring the unknown
Curiosity is the fuel for science
If you attach your identity to ideas, you're lost
Once you understand what excellence is all about, you see how excellence manifests itself in any discipline
You can't measure heart, and you can't measure desire
The mind is the most important aspect of achieving anything

authors.name: Marcus Aurelius
quotes: Everything we hear is an opinion, not a fact. Everything we see is a perspective, not the truth.

authors.name: Anaïs Nin
quotes: We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are.

authors.name: Edmund Burke
quotes: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.

authors.name: Plato
quotes: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.

authors.name: Oliver Goldsmith
quotes: Life is a journey that must be traveled no matter how bad the roads and accommodations.

authors.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.
The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
Every artist was first an amateur

authors.name: Buddha
quotes: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

authors.name: John Lennon
quotes: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

authors.name: Oscar Wilde
quotes: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.

authors.name: C.S. Lewis
quotes: You can't go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

authors.name: Mitch Albom
quotes: The way you get meaning into your life is to devote yourself to loving others, devote yourself to your community around you, and devote yourself to creating something that gives you purpose and meaning.

authors.name: Lao Tzu
quotes: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.

authors.name: William James
quotes: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.

authors.name: George Bernard Shaw
quotes: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

authors.name: Tony Robbins
quotes: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.

authors.name: Mae West
quotes: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.

authors.name: Theodore Roosevelt
quotes: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.

authors.name: Dalai Lama
quotes: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

authors.name: Sarah Louise Delany
quotes: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.

authors.name: Abraham Lincoln
quotes: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
